programme.title: Sleepaway Camp
programme.desc: Bunks and the showers are a mad stabber's beat at a summer camp strictly for teens.

programme.title: Rituals (Edited Version)
programme.desc: A man seeks to change his destiny and is introduced to the Grand Occult Group.

programme.title: Humanoids From the Deep
programme.desc: A fisherman (Doug McClure) and a scientist (Ann Turkel) fight back when mossy sea monsters assault women.

programme.title: Inseminoid
programme.desc: A space-team member (Judy Geeson) goes berserk after being impregnated by something on another planet.

programme.title: Becoming Evil: Cult of Personality
programme.sub-title: The Many Faces of Serial Killers: The Gainesville Ripper, the Unabomber and Others
programme.desc: Serial killers have many faces, from sexual sadists to thrill killers, but all of them are sociopaths who show no empathy toward other human beings.

programme.title: The Bird With the Crystal Plumage
programme.desc: An American writer (Tony Musante) hunts for an elusive slasher after witnessing an attempted murder through the glass doors of a Rome art gallery.

programme.title: Hagazussa
programme.desc: In the 15th century, a young goatherd living alone in a mountain hut feels a dark presence in the woods.

programme.title: The Island
programme.desc: The situation on the deserted island slowly escalates; the mystery of the yellow man is solved, but a new threat comes to those who stayed behind.
